lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Cho, 35, faces up to one year in federal prison for taking 35 confidential financial documents from the bank as he was leaving it for a new job.

headline.main: Former Chicago Fed Employee Guilty of Theft of Secret Documents

snippet: Jeffrey Cho, 35, faces up to one year in federal prison for taking 35 confidential financial documents from the bank as he was leaving it for a new job.
